name: Dream Plaza
description:
Dream Plaza is a small, dreamlike museum made in Unity to showcase some of my original music! Stand close to the radios and speakers to hear the songs

Made for CDM135 Project 1

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys- move

Mouse: look around
